item.title: Range Pot(Potion) help
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

case 174: // range pot (1)
rangePot = true;
rangePotTimer = 90;
abc = getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]);
cba = abc / 10;
abc2 = cba * 2;
if (abc2 <= 1) {
abc2 = 2;
}
playerLevel[4] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]);
playerLevel[4] += abc2;
sendFrame126("@red@"+playerLevel[4]+"", 4006);
deleteItem(173, GetItemSlot(173), 1);
addItem(173, 1);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
GoOn = false;
break;
case 159:
rangePot = true;
rangePotTimer = 90;
abc = getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]);
cba = abc / 10;
abc2 = cba * 2;
if (abc2 <= 1) {
abc2 = 2;
}
playerLevel[4] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]);
playerLevel[4] += abc2;
sendFrame126("@red@"+playerLevel[2]+"", 4006);
deleteItem(159, GetItemSlot(173), 1);
addItem(173, 1);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
GoOn = false;
break;

No idea if i did the code box right, I just need some help…is this right? I kinda copied the str pot code =D.
It doesn’t work, just drinks…No effect.

Read full topic
